name: Donphan
author: Naoyo Kimura
flavor_text: The longer and bigger its tusks, the higher its rank in its herd. The tusks take long to grow.

abilities.name: Sturdy
abilities.effect: If this Pokémon has full HP and would be Knocked Out by damage from an attack, this Pokémon is not Knocked Out, and its remaining HP becomes 10.

attacks.name: Rolling Spin
attacks.effect: During your next turn, this Pokémon’s Rolling Spin attack does 70 more damage (before applying Weakness and Resistance).
